name: Panicking Manneken
description:
Help Manneken Pis, the famous statue from Brussels, go to the toilet all over the world!

A Little Awful 2017 Game Jam Game based on the theme "Panic".

Programming and terrible jokes by: Afal

Art: various stuff found on google images
